title: New AI tool speeds up discovery of life-supporting microbes in microalgae
description: Scientists at NYU Abu Dhabi have developed a powerful new artificial intelligence tool called LA⁴SR that can rapidly identify previously overlooked proteins in microalgae—tiny organisms that produce much of Earth's oxygen and support entire aquatic ecosystems.

title: Elon Musk Warns He Wants to ‘Slow Down AI and Robotics’ But Says It’s Impossible and ‘Advancing at a Very Rapid Pace’
description: Elon Musk outlines a future where artificial intelligence and robotics reshape work, abundance, and human purpose amid accelerating technological change.

title: AI might not be the biggest risk for investors in 2026
description: Every shareholder may now be focused on the artificial intelligence bubble, but they shouldn’t forget the age-old market danger hiding in plain sight.

title: How Artificial Intelligence Can Take Your Career Further
description: Artificial Intelligence is no longer a futuristic concept reserved for researchers and Silicon Valley labs. In 2025, AI is everywhere—quietly reshaping how businesses operate, how doctors diagnose patients, how creators design content, and how decisions are made at scale. title: AI-generated robbery hoax prompts major police response in Elyria; employees charged
description: Two employees of a local deli are facing criminal charges after police say they fabricated a robbery report using artificial intelligence that prompted a full police response Monday morning.
content:
ELYRIA, Ohio — Two employees of a local deli are facing criminal charges after police say they fabricated a robbery report using artificial intelligence that prompted a full police response Monday morning.

title: Will OpenAI be the next tech giant or next Netscape?

title: AI-Assisted Hiring Will Drive Indeed’s Growth, Recruit CEO Says
description: Companies embracing artificial intelligence to recruit and hire people won’t threaten Indeed.com’s business model, as some investors fear, but rather help drive profit and sales growth at the No. 1 job-search portal, its chief executive officer said.

title: OpenAI Hires Ex-UK Treasury Chief Osborne for Global AI Push
description: OpenAI has hired former UK Treasury chief George Osborne to lead a new effort to work with governments on building artificial intelligence infrastructure, tapping a high-profile political figure as countries race to secure the data centers and computing power needed to run advanced AI systems.
